title: UK police arrest Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor for misconduct in public office
desc: U.K. police have arrested Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor on suspicion of misconduct in public office. On Thursday, Thames Valley Police said they opened an investigation after assessing reports about his alleged contact with Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Pakistan offers Arabian Sea trade routes to Russia, Central Asia, minister says
desc: ISLAMABAD: Pakistan is offering overland trade routes to Russia and landlocked Central Asian states through its Arabian Sea ports, Communications Minister Abdul Aleem Khan said on Thursday, positioning the country as a strategic transit hub as regional supply chains shift toward alternative corridors.
